ingredients.ingredient: 6 fresh jalapeno peppers, halved lengthwise and seeded

cookingTips: Wear gloves when handling jalapenos to avoid capsaicin irritation
Fill jalapeno halves generously with cream cheese before wrapping with bacon
Grill over medium heat for 8-10 minutes until bacon is crispy and peppers are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Advise on how to prevent bacon from burning while the peppers soften, and proper filling techniques.
